Name: Dr. C.N. Ashwath Narayan
Tweet: I am here in a land closely association with Bhagwan Basaveshwara. His philosophy called for taking all sections of society together. Sadly, the #Congress govt has not followed his principles. All they are bothered about is their votes : PM @narendramodi ji   #KarunadalliModiHawa  https://t.co/5uvAiCgfVP
